data.message: ok honestly a new eminem album in 2017 is the most pointless shit ever... eminem is an amazing rapper and the greatest of all time, but he hasn't dropped a good album since 2002, every album ever made after the eminem show has been really mediocre, and his last album mmlp2 was just absolute garbage and better off non existant and there's no hope left for any of his upcoming albums. eminem was the absolute best rapper around from 1999 to 2002 when he released sslp, mmlp and the eminem show, possibly the three greatest rap albums of all time. but everything about those albums, his crazy rhymes and disses and mass influence, that's literally all that was good about eminem and now it's been gone since the eminem show. now he's just become the most cringeworthy rapper around. just makes lame pop shit and still tries to rap even though he doesn't have the flow or influence to his raps that he used to f and it's not cool anymore. he used to rap purely based on his own thoughts and drop insane rhymes and go all out, now he's just become a cheap sell out who makes absolute garbage music and does everything he can just to get money and attention. like this shit right here. "hmm, everyone hates donald trump, easy way to mske money and be recognised" and I'm willing to bet my life savings this is just gonna be another garbage pop album. should've just retired after eminem show. R.I.P eminem.
